column5: Anyone know of a good place to get a couple flats of crawlers and a few #'s of leeches. Since the recent rip down's at the border, I would feel better about getting my bait there and avoid the hassle. Thanks.
If you go to walleye central's Llink page and find Mahumba's Fishing Page. It has info on the Thunder Bay area for bait stores. Roger Mayer.
